ygData.subject: Re: Our spell abilities
ygData.msgSnippet: I think harm touch and lay on hands are pretty damn unbalanced myself. I been harm touch in theory is friggin, great, especially at lower levels. But as people
ygData.messageBody:
I think harm touch and lay on hands are pretty damn unbalanced myself. I been
harm touch in theory is friggin, great, especially at lower levels. But as
people get higher levels say level 30, to times 30 giving a 300hp harmtouch
is in now way going to be as worthwhile as lay on hands giving a level 30
Paladin their 700-800 odd hp back! What's more, harmtouch CAN be resisted
either totaly or partialy. Also on the EQlizer site, it says basically that
the lev 15 spells we get aren't all that useful. That said we are supposidly
3/4 warrior and 1/4 necro <g> but perhaps we should get a lil more power for
being SO damn neglected by society, and we dont even have inviso to visit
those exotic locations as the necros do!

tell me what ya think and appologies for typos, im not proofreading im tired
: P

Jorval Human Level 13 Shadowknight, Cazic Thule
